workflow.meta: 信用风险管理临时报告审批流程

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ecif.tIB_XMXX_GS WHERE TDFZR = ? AND ID = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016)",[$Login.User,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,$Login.User.OrgID])>0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt==1

step.name: 质控三部文管形式审核
投行质控总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_GS_XYFXGLLSBGSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'120000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_GS_XYFXGLLSBGSP",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select status from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_GS_XYFXGLLSBGSP') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 53 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_XYFXGLLSBGSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,54,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a  = ABS_SQLVALUE('select ID from jgcrm.tuser where tUser.ID in (select userid from lbmember where orgid=20010 and roleid=131) AND status=1 AND ROWNUM =1 ORDER BY ID',[]);
var b  = ABS_SQLVALUE('select ID from jgcrm.tuser where tUser.ID in (select userid from lbmember where orgid=20010 and roleid=130) AND status=1 AND ROWNUM =1 ORDER BY ID',[]);
a==b;

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 1019 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_XYFXGLLSBGSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,1020,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}
